idea-plugin.name: Git Status Indicator
idea-plugin.description:
Shows two colored indicators in the status bar for Git repository status:
  • First circle (Changes):
    • Gray = no changes
    • Green = staged changes (ready to commit)
    • Gray/Green + red inner circle = unstaged changes (need git add)
  • Second circle (Push status): Blue = unpushed commits, Gray = all pushed
Click the indicator to open the Commit window.
